title: Agent Status
description: Schema for agent status files written to /app/status/{agent}/current.json.

current_task.description: Task ID currently being processed, or null if idle

last_completed.description: Task ID of the most recently completed task

progress_pct.description: Estimated completion percentage for the current task

message.description: Human-readable status message or error description

files_modified.description: List of file paths modified during this task (coder, deployer)

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last status update

started_at.description: When the agent started working on the current task
